emailValidationFailed.description: Error message if an invalid email address was given when creating a contact

createChatError.description: Error message if a chat could not be created

newMessageFrom.description: Displayed when a chat request is recieved

save.description: Save button label (e.g. when editing groups)

groupName.description: Placeholder text for group name input field

groupNameRequired.description: Information to user when creating group with empty name

contactCreateSuccess.description: Information to the user when a contact was created successfully

initiateKeyTransferTitle.description: Menu alternative to initiate key transfer

initiateKeyTransfer.message: 'Tranfer klucza automatycznego szyfrowania' wymaga, aby klient poczty na drugim urządzeniu był zgodny z automatycznym szyfrowaniem.\n\nMożesz wysłać klucz do siebie. Klucz zostanie zaszyfrowany za pomocą wyświetlonego tutaj kodu konfiguracyjnego, który należy wpisać na drugim urządzeniu.
initiateKeyTransfer.description: Seen before starting the setup transfer

showKeyTransferMessage.message: Klucz został wysłany do ciebie. Przejdź do innego urządzenia i otwórz wiadomość konfiguracyjną. Zostanie wyświetlona prośba o podanie kodu konfiguracyjnego. Wpisz następujące cyfry w podpowiedzi. Gdy skończysz, drugie urządzenie będzie gotowe do użycia funkcji automatycznego szyfrowania.
showKeyTransferMessage.description: Shown while viewing the transfer key

moreInfo.description: Shown on the drop-down menu for an individual message, takes you to message detail screen

downloadAttachment.description: Shown in a message's triple-dot menu if there isn't room for a dedicated download button

imageAttachmentAlt.description: Used in alt tag of image attachment

videoAttachmentAlt.message: Zrzut ekranu z filmu wideo załączono do wiadomości
videoAttachmentAlt.description: Used in alt tag of video attachment preview

lightboxImageAlt.description: Used in the alt tag for the image shown in a full-screen lightbox view

replyToMessage.description: Shown in triple-dot menu next to message to allow user to start crafting a message with a quotation

forwardMessage.description: Shown in triple-dot menu next to message to allow user to forward a message to another chat

deleteMessage.description: Shown on the drop-down menu for an individual message, deletes single message

deleteMessages.description: Menu item for deleting messages, title case.

audio.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing an audio attachment if no text was originally provided with that attachment

video.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a video if no text was originally provided with that video

photo.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a photo if no text was originally provided with that image

login.welcome.description: Welcome message at the top of the login screen

login.email.description: Label above input field for e-mail address

login.password.description: Label above input field for password

login.required.description: Word within parenthesis to let the user know that e-mail and password are required input when logging in

menu.preferences.language.description: Choose language label in the menu

menu.view.floatontop.description: Float on Top menu item label

menu.help.learn.description: Learn more about DeltaChat menu item label

menu.help.contribute.description: Contribute on GitHub menu item label

menu.help.report.description: Report an Issue... menu item label

timestampFormat_M.description: Timestamp format string for displaying month and day (but not the year) of a date within the current year, ex: use 'MMM D' for 'Aug 8', or 'D MMM' for '8 Aug'.

from.description: Label for the sender of a message

to.description: Label for the receiver of a message

sent.description: Label for the time a message was sent

send.description: Button label for sending a message

received.description: Label for the time a message was received

writeMessage.description: Placeholder text in the message entry field

writeMessageAriaLabel.message: Type a message and press enter
writeMessageAriaLabel.description: Aria-label explanation of sending a message

sendFailed.description: Error message when failed to send message

retrySend.description: Menu alternative in message context menu for resending a message

timestamp_s.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent less than a minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

timestamp_m.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

timestamp_h.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one hour ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

justNow.description: Shown if a message is very recent, less than 60 seconds old

hoursAgoShort.description: Even further contracted form of 'X hours ago' which works both for singular and plural, used in the left pane

hoursAgo.description: Contracted form of 'X hours ago' which works both for singular and plural

minutesAgoShort.description: Even further contracted form of 'X minutes ago' which works both for singular and plural, used in the left pane

minutesAgo.description: Contracted form of 'X minutes ago' which works both for singular and plural

videoScreenshotFailedToLoad.message: Nie można wyświetlić wideo ze zrzutu ekranu
videoScreenshotFailedToLoad.description: Error message when video screenshot can't be shown in a video message
